summary: Good old Uncle Sheo is back to teach you how to raise your kids in these new loading screens.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes all of the loading screens in Hearthfire to tips from your favorite Daedric Prince; Uncle Sheo. This is based off of a mod by Tumbleworld (His mod here:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12234) that changed all of Skyrim\'s loading screens to the thoughts of the Mad God. I was given permission to carry on Uncle Sheo\'s legacy with Dawnguard and now Hearthfire. My Uncle Sheo Mods:

JaySuS loading screens: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24780
Climates of Tamriel loading screens: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24865
Phenderix loading screens: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24884
Dawnguard loading screens: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31766
**NEW** Frostfall: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33738 **NEW**
author: Nonmeatbag
